game.name: R.A.T.: Human Error – Episode One
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime
game.shortDescription: The world ended. Now the real nightmare begins. Deep underground, a child wakes in a infected facility. Minds are breaking. Bodies are changing. Crawl through vents, follow echoes, and escape before it’s too late. Your mother is waiting.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The world ended. Now the real nightmare begins. Deep underground, a child wakes in a infected facility. Minds are breaking. Bodies are changing. Crawl through vents, follow echoes, and escape before it’s too late. Your mother is waiting.
